name: dollishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is similar to a doll (= a child's toy in the shape of a small person or baby), especially when this does not seem natural: She was dollishly pretty with cherry lips and golden curls. A dollishly small girl was pointing at him and laughing. Related words
doll
dollish
More examplesFewer examplesHer eyes were dollishly round, like shiny black buttons.A dollishly pretty girl with big blue eyes came in.She wasn't classically beautiful or dollishly pretty, but there was something appealing about her. He had a dollishly big head.He lost control of his body and fell dollishly to the ground.
